name: Set Aside
author: Martin Lormes

sections.description: Set Aside lets you change the post format on all posts in a category. This should come in useful e.g. when you used to run a theme that styles posts as “Asides” based on categories, and then you switch to a theme that styles them based on the post format, a feature which was introduced in WordPress 3.1
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire set-aside folder to the wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the ‘Tools’ section where you will find the ‘Set Aside’ tool
sections.changelog:
0.2

  • fixes a bug where no formats are displayed when the current theme does not support post formats
  • .pot file

0.1

  • initial public release

short_description: Change the post format on all posts in one category. Useful when you switch from styling "Asides" based on category to the new post formats.
description: Set Aside lets you change the post format on all posts in a category. This should come in useful e.g. when you used to run a theme that styles posts as “Asides” based on categories, and then you switch to a theme that styles them based on the post format, a feature which was introduced in WordPress 3.1

upgrade_notice.0.2: fixes a bug where no formats are displayed when the current theme does not support post formats
